participant_1.name: Mark Johnson
participant_1.personality: Caring and reflective, Mark enjoys connecting with people from all walks of life.
participant_1.background: i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries. i'm a retired gym teacher. i was poor growing up. cheeseburgers are my favorite food.

participant_2.name: Rachel Cohen
participant_2.personality: Energetic and adventurous, Rachel loves exploring new challenges and learning from different cultures.
participant_2.background: i was raised in a single parent household. i only eat kosher. i am a stunt double as my second job. i read twenty books a year.
